TypeSignature.Value: public class Tuple<T1,T2,T3,T4,T5,T6> : IComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable

.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Tuple`6<T1, T2, T3, T4, T5, T6> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.IComparable
Public Class Tuple(Of T1, T2, T3, T4, T5, T6) Implements IComparable, IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable

generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5, typename T6> public ref class Tuple : IComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable
type Tuple<'T1, 'T2, 'T3, 'T4, 'T5, 'T6> = class interface IStructuralEquatable interface IStructuralComparable interface IComparable

span.span: The type of the tuple's sixth component.
Represents a 6-tuple, or sextuple.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Tuple 是具有特定的數字和值序列的資料結構。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 類別代表 6-tuple 或 sextuple，也就是有六個元件的元組。The class represents a 6-tuple, or sextuple, which is a tuple that has six components. 您可以具現化藉由呼叫物件或 靜態方法。You can instantiate a object by calling either the or the static method. 您可以擷取的值元組的元件所使用的唯讀， ， ， ， ，和執行個體屬性。You can retrieve the value of the tuple's components by using the read-only , , , , , and instance properties. Tuple 常用於四種不同方式：Tuples are commonly used in four different ways: - 為了表示單一的資料集。To represent a single set of data. 比方說，tuple 可以代表資料庫記錄，和其元件可代表記錄的個別欄位。For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record. - 若要提供讓您輕鬆存取，以及操作資料集。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. 下列範例會定義物件，其中包含從 1960 到 2000年的每個人口普查紐約市人口資料。The following example defines a object that contains population data for New York City for each census from 1960 through 2000. 6-tuple 傳遞至`ComputePopulationChange`方法，它會計算每年之間 censuses，以及每年的 50 年期間的變動率的變更率。The sextuple is passed to the `ComputePopulationChange` method, which calculates the annual rate of change between censuses, as well as the annual rate of change for the entire 50 year period. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`6.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`6.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] - 若要傳回多個值的方法，而不使用來自`out`參數 （在 C#) 或`ByRef`參數 （在 Visual Basic)。To return multiple values from a method without the use of `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). 比方說前, 一個範例會傳回縣 （市） 名稱，以及其計算統計資料中物件。For example, the previous example returns its computed statistics, along with the city name, in a object. - 若要將多個值傳遞至方法，以透過單一參數。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 比方說，方法具有單一參數，可讓您提供一個值的執行緒在啟動時執行的方法。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup. 如果您提供物件做為方法引數中，您可以提供資料的六個項目使用的執行緒啟動常式。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread’s startup routine with six items of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以使用靜態方法來產生 6 元組物件，而不需要明確指定其元件的類型。You can also use the static method to instantiate a 6-tuple object without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. 下列範例會使用方法具現化 6 元組，其第一個元件是型別的，而且其剩餘的元件的型別。The following example uses the method to instantiate a 6-tuple whose first component is of type and whose remaining components are of type . [!code-csharp[System.Tuple.Create#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/cs/create1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple.Create#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple.create/vb/create1.vb#11)] 這相當於下列呼叫來類別建構函式。This is equivalent to the following call to the class constructor. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

param.name: obj
param.span: 與這個執行個體相互比較的物件。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 傳回值，這個值表示目前的 物件是否等於指定的物件。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果目前的執行個體和指定的物件相等，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`參數會被視為等於目前的執行個體，在下列情況下：The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是物件。It is a object. - 其六個元件是與目前的執行個體相同的類型。Its six components are of the same types as the current instance. - 其六個元件的目前執行個體相等。Its six components are equal to those of the current instance. 是否相等由每個元件的預設物件相等比較子決定。Equality is determined by the default object equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下列範例會定義包含母體擴展中的資料為 Los Angeles 和紐約 1960年到 2000年的 sextuples 的陣列。The following example defines an array of sextuples that contain population data for Los Angeles and New York from 1960 to 2000. 第一個元件的每個 6-tuple 識別縣 （市）。The first component of each sextuple identifies the city. 第一個、 第三和第四個 sextuples 包含紐約的資料。The first, third, and fourth sextuples contain data for New York. 第一次的 6-tuple 是 6-tuple 的重複的第四個。The first sextuple is a duplicate of the fourth sextuple. 第三個的 6-tuple 識別"紐約市"而不是"New York"縣 （市）。The third sextuple identifies the city as "New York City" instead of "New York". 如範例所示，只有第四個的 6-tuple 等於第一個的 6-tuple。As the example shows, only the fourth sextuple is equal to the first sextuple. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`6.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.equals/cs/equals1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`6.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.equals/vb/equals1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得目前 物件之第一個元件的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the current object's first component.

value.span: 目前 物件之第一個元件的值。

span.span: The value of the current object's first component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以動態決定的型別元件有兩種：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 藉由呼叫`GetType`方法所傳回的值屬性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 藉由擷取物件，表示物件，並擷取第一個項目所傳回的陣列從其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下列範例會定義各種其元件包含從 1960 到 2000年的三個美國城市 （紐約、 芝加哥及洛杉磯） 的人口資料的物件。The following example defines an array of objects whose components contain population data for three U.S. cities (New York, Chicago, and Los Angeles) from 1960 through 2000. 然後，它會顯示列出的資料的資料表。It then displays a table that lists the data. 若要顯示的城市名稱，它會擷取的值屬性分別物件。To display the city name, it retrieves the value of the property for each object. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`6.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`6.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(object other, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralComparable.CompareTo

param.name: other
param.span: 要與目前執行個體比較的物件。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 提供自訂規則進行比較的物件。

span.span: An object that provides custom rules for comparison.

summary.span: 使用指定的比較子將目前的 物件和指定的物件進行比較，並且傳回一個整數，表示目前的物件在排序順序中位於指定之物件的前面、後面還是相的位置。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 帶正負號的整數，可指出此執行個體以及排序次序中 的相對位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.

item.description: 這個執行個體位於 之前。
這個執行個體和 的排序位置相同。
這個執行個體位於 之後。
This instance and have the same position in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 這個方法可讓您定義的自訂的比較物件。This method lets you define customized comparisons of objects. 例如，您可以使用這個方法，以順序物件為基礎的特定元件的值。For example, you can use this method to order objects based on the value of a specific component. 雖然可以直接呼叫這個方法，它會最常呼叫集合排序方法，包括參數來排序集合的成員。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection-sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 比方說，它由呼叫方法和方法具現化所使用的物件建構函式。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法是用於排序作業。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 此外，它不應該使用時比較的主要目的是要判斷兩個物件是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要判斷兩個物件是否相等，請呼叫方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下列範例會建立陣列物件，其中包含三個美國城市從 1960年到 2000年的人口資料。The following example creates an array of objects that contains population data for three U.S. cities from 1960 to 2000. 6-tuple 的第一個元件是縣 （市） 名稱。The sextuple's first component is the city name. 其餘五個元件從 1960年代表母體擴展在 10 年的時間間隔，為 2000年。The remaining five components represent the population at 10-year intervals from 1960 to 2000. `PopulationComparer`類別提供實作，可讓 sextuples 排序任何一種及其元件的陣列。The `PopulationComparer` class provides an implementation that allows the array of sextuples to be sorted by any one of its components. 兩個值可供`PopulationComparer`其建構函式中的類別： 定義排序次序中，元件的位置和值，指出是否應該以遞增或遞減順序排序的 tuple 物件。Two values are provided to the `PopulationComparer` class in its constructor: The position of the component that defines the sort order, and a value that indicates whether the tuple objects should be sorted in ascending or descending order. 此範例會顯示未排序的順序陣列中的項目、 依第三個元件 （從 1970年中母體擴展） 和顯示它們，並再依照第六個元件 （2000年中母體擴展） 排序它們並加以顯示。The example then displays the elements in the array in unsorted order, sorts them by the third component (the population in 1970) and displays them, and then sorts them by the sixth component (the population in 2000) and displays them. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 實作稱為 「 只有當`other`不是`null`，如果它可以是 成功地轉型 （在 C#) 或 （在 Visual Basic) 轉換成其元件是與目前的執行個體的相同類型的物件。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object whose components are of the same types as the current instance. 方法的第一個階段的值要比較的物件實作。The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果這個方法呼叫傳回`true`，方法是呼叫一次，並傳遞兩個物件。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 這會繼續執行直到方法呼叫傳回`false`時，它會比較一組特定`Item`的值或兩個值會傳遞至方法。This continues until the method call returns `false` when it compares a specific pair of `Item` values, or the two values are passed to the method. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`RateComparer`執行自訂的測試是否相等的類別。The following example defines a `RateComparer` class that performs a custom test for equality. 如果值傳遞至其方法都屬於型別或，使用只有最多三個小數位數的方法會測試是否相等。If the values that are passed to its method are of type or , the method tests for equality by using only up to three fractional digits. 否則，它只需呼叫`x`參數的`Equals`方法。Otherwise, it simply calls the `x` parameter's `Equals` method. 此範例會使用這實作，以判斷是否有四個包含資料的母體擴展 1960年和 2000年之間的變動率的物件是否相等。The example uses this implementation to determine whether four objects that contain data on the rate of population change between 1960 and 2000 are equal. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`6.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.equals/cs/equals2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`6.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`6.equals/vb/equals2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法只會包裝對`comparer`物件的實作。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用來計算雜湊碼的演算法應該傳回相同的雜湊程式碼的兩個會被視為相等的物件。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 這個方法會提供實作類別。This method provides the implementation for the class. 雖然可以直接呼叫這個方法，它最常由呼叫集合排序的預設多載方法，例如和，來排序集合的成員。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection-sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法是用於排序作業。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 此外，它不應該使用時比較的主要目的是要判斷兩個物件是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要判斷兩個物件是否相等，請呼叫方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 方法會使用預設物件的比較子來比較每個元件。The method uses the default object comparer to compare each component. ## Examples 下列範例會建立陣列包含從 1960年 2000 美國的三個城市的人口資料的物件。The following example creates an array of objects that contain population data for three cities in the United States from 1960 to 2000. 六個元件是由後面接著在 10 年的時間間隔的城市的人口數從 1960年 2000年縣 （市） 名稱所組成。The six components consist of the city name followed by the city's population at 10-year intervals from 1960 to 2000. 此範例會顯示未排序的順序陣列中的每個 tuple 的元件、 排序陣列，，然後呼叫方法，以顯示每個 tuple 排序順序。The example displays the components of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls the method to display each tuple in sorted order. 輸出會顯示名稱，也就是第一個元件已經排序陣列。The output shows that the array has been sorted by name, which is the first component. 請注意，此範例不會直接呼叫方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 來隱含地呼叫這個方法每個項目陣列中的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array.
